pages-modal-register-details-maywegettok: Hi %s, can we get to know you?
pages-modal-register-details-optionalexp: We already created your account. You are almost ready to part-up. Share some details to make your profile reliable and we can introduce you to matching part-ups.
pages-modal-register-details-form-image-: Just use your Facebook or LinkedIn profile photo.
pages-modal-register-details-form-locati: Where do you want to join part-ups?
For example in your home town or region
We love to introduce you to the most interesting part-ups in your area. And we think of you and the environment, so we rank nearby part-ups highest.
pages-modal-register-details-form-descri: Give a short discription of who you are and what you are good at
Other uppers would like to know who they are working with. What can you tell them about you? Promote yourself by being honest.
pages-modal-register-details-form-tags_i: What you like to do and are good at in (five) keywords

We use these words to start matching you with interesting part-ups. So pick words that are about your contribution to part-ups. There is no need for perfection, we will update your profile with your actual contributions to part-ups.
pages-modal-register-details-form-social: Your social media profiles show who you are and what you are good at. Other uppers can get to know you a little.
pages-modal-register-details-form-websit: Do you have a website or blog?
pages-modal-register-details-form-phonen: Is it okay for other uppers to call (or text) you?
Availability is important in working together. Privacy as well. That's why we only share your phone number with your partners. They are the uppers you work with.
pages-modal-register-details-form-skype-: Just like your phone number, we only share your Skype name with your partners. They are the uppers you work with.
